cmp: 声 (sound/voice/(a measure word, used for sounds)/tone/noise)
几 (small table, almost, a few/how many, how much/how many/several/a few)
mng: sound, voice, tone, noise, classifier for sounds

exm.mng: to state, to declare, statement, declaration
disclaimer, statement denying or limiting responsibility
consonant, the initial consonant (of a Chinese syllable)
having sound and color (idiom); vivid, dazzling
